p: There are more data on EOs derived from aerial parts, and they were reviewed by da Silva et al. [ 32], showing a clearer dominance by sesquiterpene hydrocarbons, and specifically by germacrene D (6.7–43.0%), bicyclogermacrene (6.7–34.7%), and β-caryophyllene (5.1–11.7%), with a sesquiterpenoid such as spathulenol at 9.3–40.6%. See Table 16.
